entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:14 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 25.
